tripleplay.ui.Scroller

    tripleplay.ui  

    • Uses of Scroller in tripleplay.ui

      Methods in tripleplay.ui that return Scroller 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Scroller Scroller.findScrollParent(Element<?> elem)
      Finds the closest ancestor of the given element that is a Scroller, or null if there isn't one.
      Scroller Scroller.setBehavior(Scroller.Behavior beh)
      Sets the behavior of this scroller.
